type.name: org.gradle.api.plugins.quality.FindBugsReports
type.description: * The reporting configuration for the {@link FindBugs} task. * * Only one of the reports can be enabled when the task executes. If more than one is enabled, an {@link org.gradle.api.InvalidUserDataException} * will be thrown.

method.name: getEmacs
method.description: * The findbugs Emacs report * * @return The findbugs Emacs report

method.name: getHtml
method.description: * The findbugs HTML report * * @return The findbugs HTML report

method.name: getText
method.description: * The findbugs Text report * * @return The findbugs Text report

method.name: getXml
method.description: * The findbugs XML report * * @return The findbugs XML report

property.name: emacs
property.description: * The findbugs Emacs report * * @return The findbugs Emacs report

property.name: html
property.description: * The findbugs HTML report * * @return The findbugs HTML report

property.name: text
property.description: * The findbugs Text report * * @return The findbugs Text report

property.name: xml
property.description: * The findbugs XML report * * @return The findbugs XML report
